Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $1000000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. I look forward to discussing the details with you further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
